00009 import gyp.common
00010 import unittest

00013 
00014 class TestTopologicallySorted(unittest.TestCase):
00015   def test_Valid(self):
00016     """Test that sorting works on a valid graph with one possible order."""
00017     graph = {
00018         'a': ['b', 'c'],
00019         'b': [],
00020         'c': ['d'],
00021         'd': ['b'],
00022         }
00023     def GetEdge(node):
00024       return tuple(graph[node])
00025     self.assertEqual(
00026       gyp.common.TopologicallySorted(graph.keys(), GetEdge),
00027       ['a', 'c', 'd', 'b'])
00028 
00029   def test_Cycle(self):
00030     """Test that an exception is thrown on a cyclic graph."""
00031     graph = {
00032         'a': ['b'],
00033         'b': ['c'],
00034         'c': ['d'],
00035         'd': ['a'],
00036         }
00037     def GetEdge(node):
00038       return tuple(graph[node])
00039     self.assertRaises(
00040       gyp.common.CycleError, gyp.common.TopologicallySorted,
00041       graph.keys(), GetEdge)
00042 
00043 
00044 class TestGetFlavor(unittest.TestCase):
00045   """Test that gyp.common.GetFlavor works as intended"""
00046   original_platform = ''
00047 
00048   def setUp(self):
00049     self.original_platform = sys.platform
00050 
00051   def tearDown(self):
00052     sys.platform = self.original_platform
00053 
00054   def assertFlavor(self, expected, argument, param):
00055     sys.platform = argument
00056     self.assertEqual(expected, gyp.common.GetFlavor(param))
00057 
00058   def test_platform_default(self):
00059     self.assertFlavor('freebsd', 'freebsd9' , {})
00060     self.assertFlavor('freebsd', 'freebsd10', {})
00061     self.assertFlavor('openbsd', 'openbsd5' , {})
00062     self.assertFlavor('solaris', 'sunos5'   , {});
00063     self.assertFlavor('solaris', 'sunos'    , {});
00064     self.assertFlavor('linux'  , 'linux2'   , {});
00065     self.assertFlavor('linux'  , 'linux3'   , {});
00066 
00067   def test_param(self):
00068     self.assertFlavor('foobar', 'linux2' , {'flavor': 'foobar'})
00069 
00070 
00071 if __name__ == '__main__':
00072   unittest.main()
